title: Lee Morgan - lee-way - 1960 (APE)
description:
Lee Morgan - lee-way - 1960 {RVG Edition}

APE (image + .cue) + Log + Artwork


Tracklist:

1 These Are Soulful Days 
2 The Lion And The Wolff 
3 Midtown Blues 
4 Nakatini Suite


Lee Morgan: Trumpet
Jackie McLean: Alto Saxophone
Bobby Timmons: Piano
Paul Chambers: Bass
Art Blakey: Drums

Produced by Alfred Lion
Recorded on April 28, 1960 at the Van Gelder Studio, Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey
Originally recorded and remastered in 2002 by Rudy Van Gelder
All transfers from the analog tapes to digital were made at 24-bit resolution

This album is unique within Lee Morgan&#039;s vast and rich Blue Note discography. With then current employer Art Blakey, band mate Bobby Timmons on piano, Paul Chambers on bass and Jackie McLean on alto saxophone, the trumpeter abandons time constraints and stretches out on four, soulful, hard-bop compositions (the first and the last are by Cal Massey). These hard bop masters are constantly inspired by Blakey&#039;s explosive grooves.
